Weapon.Name: Bronze Spear
Weapon.Description: A simple spear, topped with a bronze tip.
Weapon.FlavorText: The spear has been used as a thrusting weapon for ages, providing reach to strike at the enemy first.

Weapon.Name: Short Bow
Weapon.Description: A simple, albeit primitive short bow. Made of a flexable wooden shaft and a sinew bowstring.
Weapon.FlavorText: Bows like this were taking down small game centuries ago. Simple to make, maintain, and carry.

Weapon.Name: Sling
Weapon.Description: A simple, albeit primitive sling. Made of braided flax.
Weapon.FlavorText: Slings have been mentioned even in the most ancient texts as weapons of sheperds and soldiers.

Weapon.Name: Wooden Sword
Weapon.Description: A simple wooden sword. Full of spliters.
Weapon.FlavorText: Swords like these are used by youth to build strong muscles.

Weapon.Name: Wooden Cudgel
Weapon.Description: A simple wooden club. Design unchanged for centuries.
Weapon.FlavorText: When all else fails, beating ones enemies senseless with a wooden stick is a crude but effective tactic.

Weapon.Name: Great Axe
Weapon.Description: A sturdy oak shaft connected to a doubled bladed sharpened head.
Weapon.FlavorText: Famously used by the barbarian nations to the north to great effect.

Potion.Name: Minor Health Potion
Potion.ItemDescription: Drinking will restore your health slightly.
Potion.FlavorText: Distilled by a junior alchemist, this potion is dark brown in color and smells of cinnamon.

Potion.Name: Haste Potion
Potion.ItemDescription: Drinking will speed you up for a short time.
Potion.FlavorText: This extract from a rare jungle plant will increase your movements and reflexes for a short time. Some have become addicted to the rush, and its sale is restricted in many areas.

Potion.Name: Minor Mana Potion
Potion.ItemDescription: Drinking will increase your mana somewhat.
Potion.FlavorText: Hundreds of lightning bugs are harvested during the nights of spring and are condensed into this blue syrup.

Scroll.Name: Scroll of Haste
Scroll.ItemDescription: Reading this scroll will warp time around you for a short period of time, speeding your actions.
Scroll.FlavorText: The text of this scroll is blury and hard to keep in focus.

Scroll.Name: Scroll of Teleportation
Scroll.ItemDescription: Reading this scroll will warp space around you, moving you to a new location instantly.
Scroll.FlavorText: >A thick parchment engraved in ink which fades and returns into view.

Potion.Name: Scroll of Blinking
Potion.ItemDescription: Drinking this potion will shunt your body to the ether plane for a few moments, moving you slightly from your current location.
Potion.FlavorText: >Sparkely concoction filled with points of light that dance into and out of existance.

Wand.Name: Wand of Haste
Wand.ItemDescription: Zapping this wand will warp around you for a short period of time, speeding your actions.
Wand.FlavorText: This wand is molded from a deep red hardwood, with intricate crossweaving patterns carved into it.

Wand.Name: Wand Of Ice Bolt
Wand.ItemDescription: Zapping it creates a 2 foot long icicle and hurle it at the target.
Wand.FlavorText: A frozen icicle shaped wand, never melting no matter the temperature.

Wand.Name: Wand Of Magic Missile
Wand.ItemDescription: Zapping produces two tiny bolts of force striking a nearby target.
Wand.FlavorText: A simple polished wooden dowel commonly found in schools of magic.

Armor.Name: Robe
Armor.ItemDescription: A simple robe favored by acolytes and mage apprentices.
Armor.FlavorText: Water resistant and warm, but provides little combat protection.

Armor.Name: Wool Cap
Armor.ItemDescription: Simple woolen cap, tan and somewhat stiff from wear.
Armor.FlavorText: Provides little protection from anything beyond sunlight and rain.

Armor.Name: Sandles
Armor.ItemDescription: Formed from sturdy cloth or leather with leather strapes.
Armor.FlavorText: Protects against rocks and thorns underfoot.

Armor.Name: Leather Armor
Armor.ItemDescription: Tanned animal hides fashioned into a simple breastplate.
Armor.FlavorText: Able to mildly turn knifes and arrow strikes to the body.

Armor.Name: Leather Helmet
Armor.ItemDescription: Beaten animal hides cured into a sturdy helmet.
Armor.FlavorText: Warm and uncomfortable in the sun but very sturdy.

Armor.Name: Leather Gloves
Armor.ItemDescription: Boiled leather worked into simple armor for the hands.
Armor.FlavorText: Hardened through a time consuming process of boiling with wax and worked with tools repeadily.

Armor.Name: Leather Boots
Armor.FlavorText: Sturdy thick leather sole laced up to the calf.
